item.description:
I've talked to several Ex-Midwesterners and the thing I'm constantly hearing is "lets go bowling that would be fun".  So on that note fellow Ex-Midwesterns "lets go bowling".  Jillians by Fenway is a really fun place!  Its 3 levels with bars and other things to do plus its right by Fenway which is lively and the T (Kenmore on Greenline).  If people want to park there is street parking around the area and the address is 145 Ipswich Street (Corner of Lansdowne and Ipswich)

The price is also right, shoes are $3.50 and games are $6 per game so I'm thinking we could roll a couple of games.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the Front Bowling Desk
item.why: I've talked to several Ex-Midwesterners and the thing I'm constantly hearing is "lets go bowling that would be fun". So on that note fellow Ex-Midwesterns "lets go bowling". Jillians by Fenway is a really fun place!
item.name: Bowling at Jillians by Fenway Park
